backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Lists detected features, associated frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for build planning.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for key frontend components, hooks, and types.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables defining light/dark color schemes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell setting the app title and loading the React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing authentication, product ordering, admin panels, and rendering ShopView with products and orders.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin form for adding products with validation, success/error alerts, and embedded guidance component.
frontend/src/components/HowToAddProducts: Static instructional card explaining step-by-step how to add products, with icons and tips.
frontend/src/components/LoginView.tsx: Login form validating credentials, distinguishing admin vs customer, and reporting errors.
frontend/src/components/OrdersPanel.tsx: Displays grouped customer orders with admin controls and supports clearing order history.
frontend/src/components/ShopView.tsx: Shows products sorted by sales and allows placing new orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state via Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Manages order storage in localStorage with functions to add and clear orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Loads, stores, and updates product data in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theming variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/types/order.ts: Defines the Order type with product, timestamp, and optional customer name.
frontend/src/types/product.ts: Defines the Product type with name and price fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the current state of a single‑page web app with localStorage‑based product data, login rules, architectural notes, and known UI issues. Includes feature definitions and requirements for login, product persistence, shop view, and admin panel functionality.
